body:
> ... My plan in general is best effort with limited scope. I think even partial improvement with backwards compatibility is a success.

I am skeptical about "best effort" approach. This sometimes gets interpreted as "it works". And later as "it is expected to work". If things are broken, I don't want to give false impression.

If any of your changes solve a particular problem we have, then I am OK with them. Otherwise I am not.

Alex
